purpose: To present opportunities for participants to engage with Mastercard's analytics capabilities.
title: This session presents an opportunity for participants to–

bullets.text: Get an overview of how Mastercard’s data assets and analytics capabilities act as powerful differentiators in D&S engagements – which are jointly powered by in-region capabilities and COE expertise
Understand more about a range of standardized and custom data analytics solutions developed for clients all across Financial institutions, merchants in the retail and commerce space
Interact with the global experts who power Mastercard’s analytics capabilities. Receive follow up information on Sales and PEM needs and know whom to reach out for more information

reasoning_strategy: Highlight key areas of impact, breadth, and outreach.

text_rules.emphasis_rule: Use of bold for key terms
